title: The Particular Kitchen banana bread
ingredients: ['280g plain spelt flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 heaped teaspoons egg replacement powder (I like Orgran "No-Egg")', '4 tablespoons rice milk (or other milk substitute)', '8 tablespoons vegan margarine (I like pure sunflower)', '125g agave nectar', '3 very ripe bananas, mashed', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50g dessicated coconut']
